text: Karol Wojciech Kozun (born 23 March 1982) is a Paralympian track and field athlete from Poland competing mainly in category F55 throwing events. He competed in two Summer Paralympics winning a silver medal in the discus at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London. ==Personal career== Kozun was born in Sieradz, Poland in 1982. In 2005 he suffered a broken spine after a traffic accident. == References == Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:People from Sieradz Category:Polish male shot putters Category:Polish male javelin throwers Category:Disabled track and field athletes Category:Paralympic athletes of Poland Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Poland Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Karol Kozun
